translation.en: THIS JOB IS EATING ME ALIVE.
I CAN'T BREATHE ANYMORE.
I SPENT ALL THESE YEARS TRYING TO BE THE GOOD GUY,
translation.fr: Tant d'années à vouloir bien faire, à jouer le jeu.

translation.en: THE MAN IN THE WHITE HAT.
translation.fr: à vouloir bien faire, à jouer le jeu.

translation.en: I'M NOT BECOMING LIKE THEM.
I AM THEM.
HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING, WEIRDO?
I'M DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
OR ACTUALLY,
TEN OF ME ARE DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
translation.fr: dix moi font le monologue de Donnie Brasco.

translation.en: WHAT'S UP?
GET IT TOGETHER, MAN. OKAY?
SO THE STORE WAS HIT ABOUT TWO HOURS AGO.
translation.fr: Donc il y a deux heures,

translation.en: THEY TOOK MOSTLY TABLETS, LAPTOPS, AND CAMERAS.
translation.fr: on vous a volé tablettes, ordinateurs et appareils photo.

translation.en: [music stops] SORRY.
I'D LIKE A LIST OF ALL YOUR EMPLOYEES,
translation.fr: Je veux la liste des gens

translation.en: WHOEVER HAD ACCESS TO THE STORE.
translation.fr: qui ont eu accès au magasin.

translation.en: I'D ALSO LIKE TO APOLOGIZE FOR MY PARTNER. HIS PARENTS DIDN'T GIVE HIM ENOUGH ATTENTION.
translation.fr: Excusez mon équipier, ses parents l'ont un peu négligé.

translation.en: UH, DETECTIVE...
I ALREADY SOLVED THE CASE.
WE'RE LOOKING FOR THREE WHITE MALES, ONE OF WHOM HAS SLEEVE TATS ON BOTH ARMS.
translation.fr: On cherche trois Blancs, dont un aux bras tatoués.

translation.en: AND HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT?
I HAD AN INFORMANT ON THE INSIDE.
HE'S BEEN HERE FOR YEARS.
WATCHING, LEARNING. WAITING.
translation.fr: Il observe, il apprend, il attend.

translation.en: HIS CODE NAME?
FUZZY CUDDLE BEAR.
HE'S A NANNY CAM.
[scoffs] YOU GOT LUCKY.
NO, I GOT HERE FIVE MINUTES BEFORE YOU AND FIGURED THAT IN THIS GIGANTIC ELECTRONICS STORE,
translation.fr: Non. Je me suis dit qu'un magasin d'électronique

translation.en: THERE HAD TO BE AT LEAST ONE WORKING CAMERA.
translation.fr: doit avoir une caméra en marche.

translation.en: OH! HI, BAD GUYS!
YOU DID IT, FUZZY. YOU BUSTED 'EM.
translation.fr: Coucou, les méchants ! Bravo, Nounours, tu les as coincés. Ta mission est terminée.

translation.en: IT'S TIME TO COME HOME.
translation.fr: tu les as coincés. Ta mission est terminée.

translation.en: [as Fuzzy] I'M NOT SURE IF I CAN.
translation.fr: Je sais pas si je peux rentrer.

translation.en: I'VE BEEN UNDERCOVER SO LONG, I'VE FORGOTTEN WHO I AM.
translation.fr: Depuis le temps, j'ai oublié qui j'étais.

translation.en: I HAVE SEEN TERRIBLE THINGS.
I HAVEN'T KNOWN THE TOUCH OF A WOMAN IN MANY MOONS. ALL RIGHT.
translation.fr: Aucune femme ne m'a touché depuis des lunes.

translation.en: DETECTIVE SANTIAGO!
DON'T WALK AWAY FROM ME!
(Jake) YES, I DID CRACK THE CASE.
translation.fr: 99e Séance D'information Enceinte du Matin Oui, j'ai élucidé l'affaire.

translation.en: SO, SANTIAGO, WOULD YOU DO THE HONORS?
I HATE THIS!
I HATE THIS. AND YOU'RE JUST GONNA ADD ONE. I'M WINNING.
translation.fr: Une de plus pour moi. Je gagne !

translation.en: IT'S A GOOD FEELING.
IT'S A GOOD FEELING. YEAH.
ENJOY IT WHILE IT LASTS.
JP, UPDATE ON THE MORGENTHAU MURDER?
translation.fr: JP, un point sur le meurtre Morgenthau ?

translation.en: YEAH! GOOD NEWS FOR ALL YOU MURDER FANS.
translation.fr: Bonne nouvelle pour les fans de meurtres.

translation.en: [laughter] EARLIER THIS MORNING...
SOMEONE DECIDED TO SHOOT AND KILL
LUXURY FOOD IMPORTER HENRY MORGENTHAU.
BODY WAS FOUND BY THE CLEANING LADY,
translation.fr: Sa femme de ménage l'a trouvé.

translation.en: DURING HER INTERVIEW, I DEDUCED, USING EXPERT DETECTIVE WORK,
translation.fr: Mes talents d'enquêteur m'ont permis de déduire

translation.en: THAT SHE HAD SOMETHING SUPER GROSS ON HER CHIN.
translation.fr: Mes talents d'enquêteur m'ont permis de déduire qu'elle avait un truc crade sur le menton.

translation.en: I THINK IT WAS FLAN.
CHARLES THINKS IT WAS FLAN. I THINK IT WAS BUTTERSCOTCH PUDDING.
translation.fr: Moi, je penche pour de la crème caramel.

translation.en: MAYBE IT WAS JUST OLD PERSON GUNK. YOU KNOW HOW OLD PEOPLE ALWAYS HAVE THAT GUNK ON THEM.
translation.fr: Des bavouillis de vieux. Ils en sont couverts.

translation.en: OLDIE GUNK. COULD BE, YEAH.
ANYONE ELSE? HOW ABOUT WE FOCUS ON THE MURDER AND NOT THE OLD PERSON GUNK?
translation.fr: Focalisons-nous sur le meurtre plutôt que sur les bavouillis.

translation.en: CRIME TECHS ARE AT THE SCENE NOW. WE'RE HEADING BACK WHEN THEY'RE DONE.
translation.fr: On y retourne quand la Scientifique aura fini.

translation.en: OKAY, I WANT YOU ON THIS. IT'S GONNA BE PRIORITY ONE FOR THE NEW C.O.
translation.fr: Soyez au taquet, le nouveau chef en fait sa priorité.

translation.en: WAIT, TELL US ABOUT THE NEW CAPTAIN.
CAPTAIN HOLT WILL BE HERE SOON. HE'LL WANNA INTRODUCE HIMSELF.
translation.fr: Le capitaine Holt arrive, il se présentera.

translation.en: DISMISSED.
HEY, GINA.
YOU KNOW ANY SCALPERS?
translation.fr: J'aimerais inviter Rosa au concert de Rihanna,

translation.en: I WANNA ASK ROSA TO GO TO THE RIHANNA CONCERT WITH ME,
translation.fr: J'aimerais inviter Rosa au concert de Rihanna, mais c'est complet.

translation.en: BUT IT'S SOLD OUT.
OKAY, TWO POINTS TO MAKE HERE. FIRST, RIHANNA...
YOU...
AND THEN RIHANNA.
YEAH. WHAT'S YOUR SECOND POINT?
SHE'S GOT A TYPE. WHICH IS REALLY ANYONE BUT YOU.
translation.fr: Son genre, c'est n'importe qui sauf toi.

translation.en: YEAH, THAT WAS MY EX-WIFE'S TYPE TOO.
LOOK, A RIHANNA CONCERT'S A PRETTY BIG SWING, MAN.
translation.fr: Un concert de Rihanna, c'est risqué.

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW. SHE'S INTO WATCHING OLD MOVIES.
translation.fr: - Elle aime mater de vieux films. - Cool.

translation.en: COOL. WHERE WOULD I FIND A PLACE THAT SHOWS OLD MOVIES?
translation.fr: Où est-ce qu'on projette de vieux films ?

translation.en: OH, YEAH, JUST GO ON THE INTERNET
AND SEARCH FOR THE PHRASE "I WANT TO BUY TWO MOVIE TICKETS
translation.fr: Va sur internet et tape : "Je veux deux places de ciné pour une fille qui ne m'aime pas."

translation.en: FOR A GIRL WHO DOESN'T LIKE ME."
translation.fr: "Je veux deux places de ciné pour une fille qui ne m'aime pas."

translation.en: GREAT. THANK YOU. GOOD.
HEY, YOU HEARD ANYTHING ABOUT THE NEW CAPTAIN?
translation.fr: Tu sais quoi sur le nouveau capitaine ?

translation.en: UH, NO, AND I DON'T CARE.
I JUST WISH CAPTAIN MCGINTLEY NEVER LEFT, HE WAS THE BEST.
translation.fr: Je regrette McGintley, il était top.

translation.en: HE WAS TERRIBLE. YOU JUST LIKED HIM 'CAUSE HE LET YOU DO ANYTHING YOU WANTED.
translation.fr: Il était nul ! Tu le menais par le bout du nez.

translation.en: ON YOUR MARKS, GET SET...
WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON AROUND HERE?
FIRE EXTINGUISHER ROLLER CHAIR DERBY?
WHAT'S YOUR POINT?
IF I'M EVER GONNA MAKE CAPTAIN, I NEED A GOOD MENTOR. I NEED MY RABBI.
translation.fr: Pour passer capitaine, il me faut un mentor. Un rabbin.

translation.en: SORRY, DUDE... BUT THIS NEW GUY'S GONNA BE ANOTHER WASHED-UP PENCIL PUSHER
translation.fr: Désolé, mais ce sera encore un gratte-papier piteux

translation.en: WHO'S ONLY CONCERNED WITH... [robotically] FOLLOWING EVERY RULE IN THE PATROL GUIDE.
translation.fr: obsédé par l'application du règlement à la lettre.

translation.en: MEEP MORP ZEEP. ROBOT CAPTAIN ENGAGE.
IS THAT WHAT YOU THINK? HE-HEY!
NEW CAPTAIN ALERT. [laughs]
YOU MUST BE THE NEW C.O. I'M DETECTIVE JAKE PERALTA. GREAT TO MEET YOU.
translation.fr: Vous devez être le nouveau chef. Jake Peralta, enchanté.

translation.en: NOW DON'T LET ME INTERRUPT. YOU WERE DESCRIBING WHAT KIND OF PERSON I'M GONNA BE. I'D LIKE YOU TO FINISH.
translation.fr: Vous étiez en train de me décrire. J'aimerais entendre la fin.

translation.en: THAT'S NOT NECESSARY.
OR I COULD RECAP VERY QUICKLY, SURE.
translation.fr: Mais je peux faire un résumé rapide.

translation.en: UM, LET'S SEE.
I THINK I SAID SOME JOKE ABOUT BEING A WASHED-UP PENCIL PUSHER.
translation.fr: J'ai dû blaguer, parler de gratte-papier piteux...

translation.en: NOW DO THE ROBOT VOICE. WHICH--
THE ROBOT VOICE YOU WERE DOING
WHEN YOU IMPLIED I'M A RULE-FOLLOWING ROBOT.
translation.fr: en me traitant de robot procédurier. J'attends.

translation.en: ROBOT.
THAT'S A TERRIBLE ROBOT VOICE. YEP.
THE NEXT TIME I SEE YOU, I'D LIKE YOU TO BE WEARING A NECKTIE.
translation.fr: Que je ne vous revoie pas sans cravate.

translation.en: OH, ACTUALLY, THE LAST CAPTAIN DIDN'T CARE IF WE WORE TIES.
WELL, YOUR NEW CAPTAIN DOES. AND MORE IMPORTANTLY, HE CARES THAT YOU FOLLOW HIS DIRECT ORDERS.
translation.fr: Pas le nouveau. Il veut aussi qu'on suive ses ordres.

translation.en: EVERYONE, I'M YOUR NEW COMMANDING OFFICER,
CAPTAIN RAY HOLT.
SPEECH!
SHORT AND SWEET.
SERGEANT JEFFORDS, A WORD.
translation.fr: Sergent Jeffords, j'ai à vous parler.

translation.en: YES, SIR.
[sighs] I LOVE THAT GUY.
SAME!
HE'S SO SUAVE.
DOES ANYONE GET A LITTLE BIT OF A GAY VIBE?
translation.fr: Vous avez pas senti un petit côté gay ?

translation.en: SERGEANT, YOU WERE IN THE 1-8 WITH ME...
THOUGH YOU WERE SIGNIFICANTLY--
FATTER, SIR.
THEY CALLED ME "TERRY TITTIES."
BECAUSE I HAD LARGE, UH--
TITTIES, YES. I REMEMBER.
I NEVER LIKED THAT NICKNAME. THOUGH TO BE FAIR, IT WAS ACCURATE.
translation.fr: Je n'aimais pas ce surnom. Même s'il était approprié.

translation.en: WHAT'S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU BEING ON ADMINISTRATIVE LEAVE?
translation.fr: Vous êtes consigné à votre bureau ?

translation.en: A YEAR AGO, MY WIFE AND I HAD TWIN BABY GIRLS.
translation.fr: Il y a un an, ma femme et moi avons eu des jumelles.

translation.en: CAGNEY AND LACEY.
THEY HAVE ADORABLE CHUBBY CHEEKS.
EVER SINCE, I KINDA GOT SCARED OF GETTING HURT.
LOST MY EDGE.
THERE WAS AN INCIDENT IN A DEPARTMENT STORE.
translation.fr: Il y a eu l'incident dans le magasin.

translation.en: HEY, MAN, YOU OKAY? YOU LOOK A LITTLE JUMPY.
I'M FINE. I'M FINE.
I THINK HE'S DEAD.
AND I'M STILL NOT RIGHT.
TELL ME ABOUT YOUR DETECTIVE SQUAD.
WELL, SCULLY, HITCHCOCK, AND DANIELS.
translation.fr: Scully, Hitchcock et Daniels sont bons à rien,

translation.en: THEY'RE PRETTY MUCH WORTHLESS,
translation.fr: et Daniels sont bons à rien,

translation.en: BUT THEY MAKE GOOD COFFEE.
COPY THAT.
NOW THE GOOD ONES. ROSA DIAZ.
TOUGH, SMART, HARD TO READ, AND REALLY SCARY.
TELL ME WHO HAS ME FOR SECRET SANTA.
translation.fr: Qui achète mon cadeau de Noël ?

translation.en: NO! THAT TAKES ALL THE FUN OUT OF IT.
translation.fr: C'est moins drôle si tu sais !

translation.en: IT'S SCULLY. HE GOT YOU A SCARF.
translation.fr: C'est Scully. Il t'a acheté un foulard.

translation.en: I'LL MAKE HIM RETURN IT. YES, YOU WILL.
translation.fr: - Je lui ferai échanger. - T'as intérêt.

translation.en: CHARLES BOYLE. HE'S A GRINDER.
NOT THE MOST BRILLIANT DETECTIVE, BUT HE WORKS HARDER THAN ANYONE ELSE.
translation.fr: Pas le plus brillant, mais il bosse plus que quiconque.

translation.en: HE'S NOT PHYSICALLY GIFTED.
translation.fr: Physiquement, il est pas très doué.

translation.en: OH, MAN! MY MUFFIN.
OH, MY HEAD! MY MUFFIN, MY HEAD!
translation.fr: Ma tête ! Mon muffin, ma tête. Et j'ai marché sur mon muffin...

translation.en: AND I STEPPED ON THE-- ON MY MUFFIN! AND MY HEAD AND MY MUFFIN.
translation.fr: Mon muffin, ma tête. Et j'ai marché sur mon muffin...

translation.en: AMY SANTIAGO.
SHE'S GOT SEVEN BROTHERS, SO SHE'S ALWAYS TRYING TO PROVE SHE'S TOUGH.
translation.fr: Elle a sept frères. Elle a appris à jouer les dures.

translation.en: CAREFUL. THAT STUFF'S PRETTY HOT.
OH, IS IT? HMM?
SHE AND PERALTA HAVE SOME BIG BET OVER WHO GETS MORE ARRESTS THIS YEAR.
translation.fr: Peralta et elle font la course aux arrestations.

translation.en: EVER SINCE THE BET, THEIR NUMBERS HAVE GONE WAY UP.
translation.fr: Depuis leur pari, elles se sont multipliées.

translation.en: TELL ME ABOUT PERALTA.
JACOB PERALTA IS MY BEST DETECTIVE.
translation.fr: Jacob Peralta est mon meilleur élément.

translation.en: HE LIKES PUTTING AWAY BAD GUYS AND HE LOVES SOLVING PUZZLES.
THE ONLY PUZZLE HE HASN'T SOLVED
IS HOW TO GROW UP.
THAT WAS VERY WELL PUT.
I'VE TALKED A LOT ABOUT JAKE IN MY DEPARTMENTALLY MANDATED THERAPY SESSIONS.
translation.fr: J'ai beaucoup parlé de lui aux séances de thérapie obligatoire.

translation.en: LOOK, YOU KNOW MY HISTORY. YOU KNOW HOW IMPORTANT THIS IS TO ME.
translation.fr: Vu mon passé, vous savez que je tiens à ce poste.

translation.en: THIS PRECINCT IS DOING FINE, BUT I WANNA MAKE IT THE BEST ONE IN BROOKLYN.
translation.fr: Je veux faire de ce district le meilleur de Brooklyn.

translation.en: AND I NEED YOUR HELP.
ABSOLUTELY, SIR.
WHERE DO WE START?
♪ WHAT IS HAPPENING? ♪
WE START WITH HIM.
OKAY, SO THE PERP CAME IN THROUGH THE WINDOW,
translation.fr: Il est entré par la fenêtre,

translation.en: LEFT THE MUDDY RED FOOTPRINT,
AND APPARENTLY HAD SEX WITH THE DISH RACK.
SHELL CASING FOUND HERE. TWO SHOTS. BANG, BANG.
translation.fr: On a trouvé des douilles ici. Deux coups.

translation.en: GREAT WORK, DETECTIVE.
translation.fr: Beau boulot, inspecteur. Vous gagnez une cravate.

translation.en: YOU GET A TIE. HEY, THAT'S MINE. YOU TOOK IT FROM MY DESK.
translation.fr: Tu l'as prise sur mon bureau.

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT, CHARLES. GOOD SOLVE.
TIE FOR YOU. THANKS!
NOW EVERYONE BE SURE TO PUT THOSE ON BECAUSE IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO SOLVE CRIMES UNLESS YOU'RE WEARING A TIE.
translation.fr: Mettez-les, on peut pas élucider un crime sans cravate.

translation.en: LAY OFF THE CAPTAIN. THAT MAN IS GONNA BE MY RABBI.
translation.fr: Lâche le capitaine, ce sera mon rabbin.

translation.en: OKAY, FIRST OF ALL, WHEN YOU USE THE WORD "RABBI," YOU KNOW THAT TURNS ME ON
translation.fr: Quand tu dis "rabbin", ça m'excite et c'est pas sympa, au boulot.

translation.en: SECONDLY, YOUR RABBI IS A PAIN IN MY ASS.
YEAH, HE'S A LITTLE TOO SERIOUS.
translation.fr: Il est un peu trop sérieux. Tu trouves pas ?

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK, ROSA? HE SEEMS COOL.
translation.fr: Il est un peu trop sérieux. Tu trouves pas ? - Il a l'air cool. - Pas faux.

translation.en: YEAH, HE SEEMS COOL. I AGREE.
translation.fr: - Il a l'air cool. - Pas faux.

translation.en: LOOKS LIKE THE PERP STOLE A COMPUTER, A WATCH,
translation.fr: Il aurait volé un ordi, une montre

translation.en: AND A JAMON IBERICO HAM, VALUED AT--WHAT!
translation.fr: et un jamón ibérico estimé à 6 000 dollars !

translation.en: $6,000 FOR A HAM?
JAMON IBERICO IS AN AMAZING CURED HAM FROM SPAIN.
translation.fr: Le jamón ibérico est un jambon espagnol extraordinaire.

translation.en: THEY HAD IT AT MY UNCLE'S FUNERAL. I GORGED MYSELF AT THAT FUNERAL.
translation.fr: Je m'en suis gavé aux obsèques de mon oncle.

translation.en: I MEAN, I WAS CONSTIPATED FOR THREE DAYS.
WOW, THAT'S A GREAT STORY, CHARLES, THANK YOU.
[laughing] ALL RIGHT, LISTEN UP, EVERYBODY.
BETTER CONTACT CAPTAIN HOLT, LET HIM KNOW WE GOT A TEN-TIE SITUATION.
translation.fr: Prévenez Holt, il nous faut 10 cravates.

translation.en: SPEAKING OF TIES, WHERE'S YOURS, MEEP MORP?
translation.fr: A propos, où est la vôtre ?

translation.en: THIS IS FANTASTIC.
CAPTAIN! HEY! WELCOME TO THE MURDER. WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
translation.fr: Capitaine ! Bienvenue au meurtre. Quel bon vent ?

translation.en: I LIKE TO KNOW WHAT MY DETECTIVES ARE UP TO.
translation.fr: Je me tiens au courant. Ça vous va ?

translation.en: TAKE SANTIAGO AND KNOCK ON DOORS. SEE IF THE NEIGHBORS HEARD ANYTHING.
translation.fr: Allez frapper aux portes des voisins.

translation.en: DOOR DUTY? IT'S A WASTE OF TIME.
DIAZ AND BOYLE. CHECK IN THE CORONER.
translation.fr: Diaz et Boyle, je veux des nouvelles du légiste.

translation.en: [sighs] THAT WENT WELL.
NO, IT DIDN'T.
HE'S GOT LIKE SUPER HEARING.
HEY, ROSA! ROSA. ROSA!
UM, I JUST HAPPENED TO NOTICE THAT THERE'S AN OLD MOVIE FESTIVAL
translation.fr: Je me suis rendu compte qu'un festival de reprises

translation.en: PLAYING AT THE FILM FORUM THIS WEEK.
WANNA GO? SURE.
COOL! AWESOME.
THERE'S A BUNCH OF MOVIE OPTIONS. I'LL PROBABLY JUST GO WITH SOMETHING CLASSIC
translation.fr: On a le choix. J'opterais pour un grand classique,

translation.en: LIKE CITIZEN KANE.
translation.fr: comme Citizen Kane. C'est nul, choisis un bon film.

translation.en: CITIZEN KANE IS TERRIBLE. PICK A GOOD MOVIE.
translation.fr: C'est nul, choisis un bon film.

translation.en: GOOD CALL. SMART.
I'LL DO IT.
I'LL PICK A BETTER MOVIE THAN CITIZEN KANE.
(Holt) SO GINA...
CIVILIAN ADMINISTRATORS LIKE YOURSELF OFTEN HAVE THEIR EAR TO THE GROUND.
translation.fr: les employés administratifs tels que vous entendent tout.

translation.en: WHAT DO SANTIAGO AND PERALTA HAVE RIDING ON THIS BET OF THEIRS?
translation.fr: Quel est l'enjeu du pari de Santiago et Peralta ?

translation.en: I WILL TELL YOU ON SIX CONDITIONS.
translation.fr: Je vous le dis à six conditions.

translation.en: NUMBER ONE, YOU LET ME USE YOUR OFFICE TO PRACTICE MY DANCE MOVES.
translation.fr: Un : je peux bosser ma chorégraphie dans votre bureau.

translation.en: IF YOU TELL ME... MM-HMM.
translation.fr: Mieux : si vous me le dites,

translation.en: I WON'T HAVE YOU SUSPENDED... WITHOUT PAY.
translation.fr: je ne vous fais pas suspendre sans salaire.

translation.en: OH, THAT SOUNDS GREAT.
OKAY, THE DEAL IS IF AMY GETS MORE ARRESTS, JAKE HAS TO GIVE HER HIS CAR.
translation.fr: Si Amy arrête davantage de gens, Jake lui donne sa voiture.

translation.en: IT'S AN OLD MUSTANG, AND IT'S PRETTY SWEET.
translation.fr: Une Mustang de collection super chouette.

translation.en: IF HE GETS MORE ARRESTS, SHE HAS TO GO ON A DATE WITH HIM.
translation.fr: Si c'est lui qui gagne, elle lui doit un rencard.

translation.en: HE GUARANTEES IT WILL END IN SEX.
translation.fr: Il est certain que ça finira au lit.

translation.en: I BET ON AT LEAST SOME OVER-THE-CLOTHES ACTION.
translation.fr: Je table sur au moins une étreinte tout habillés, du pelotage...

translation.en: AT THE VERY LEAST, SOME TOUCHING...
translation.fr: une étreinte tout habillés, du pelotage...

translation.en: NO, THAT'S ENOUGH, GINA. CARESSES.
I COULD SEE HIM SHOWING UP IN A SILK ROBE.
translation.fr: Lui, je l'imagine en peignoir de soie...

translation.en: THAT'S ENOUGH, GINA. ALL RIGHT.
THANK YOU.
(Jake) LET THE WASTING OF TIME BEGIN.
translation.fr: Le Bâtiment de Morgenthau Devoir de Porte Que la perte de temps commence !

translation.en: HELLO, SIR. CAN WE ASK YOU A FEW QUESTIONS?
translation.fr: Bonjour. Peut-on vous poser quelques questions ?

translation.en: DEFINITELY. YEAH.
I'M ACTUALLY--I'M SUPER GLAD YOU GUYS ARE HERE RIGHT NOW. ARE YOU SMELLING THAT WEED SMELL?
translation.fr: Je suis content de vous voir. Vous sentez l'herbe ?

translation.en: (both) YEAH. 'CAUSE A DUDE BROKE IN,
translation.fr: Un mec est entré en douce,

translation.en: SMOKED WEED, AND BOLTED. [laughing] IT'S--
translation.fr: a fumé de l'herbe et s'est barré.

translation.en: DO YOU THINK IT'S THE SAME DUDE THAT LEFT THAT BONG THERE ON THE FLOOR?
translation.fr: C'est lui qui a laissé le bang par terre ?

translation.en: POLICE!
WHAT'S YOUR NAME? MY NAME? MM-HMM.
MLEPNOS. CAN YOU SPELL THAT, PLEASE?
M-L-E-P...
DID YOU SAY "CLAY"? YES, THE "CLAY" IS SILENT.
ALL RIGHT, GOT IT.
translation.fr: C'est noté. Vous l'avez déjà vu ? Il a été tué hier soir.

translation.en: HAVE YOU SEEN THIS MAN BEFORE? HE WAS SHOT LAST NIGHT.
translation.fr: Vous l'avez déjà vu ? Il a été tué hier soir.

translation.en: NO, SIR, THAT'S OURS. WE NEED THAT.
WE-- AND HE KEPT IT.
WALL STREET JOURNAL ON THE DOORMAT...
TOP FLOOR APARTMENT. 20 BUCKS SAYS THIS GUY'S LIKE A HOT, ELIGIBLE BACHELOR.
translation.fr: un appart au dernier étage. C'est un célibataire friqué et canon.

translation.en: I'LL TAKE THAT ACTION.
POLICE! OPEN UP!
[laughing] OH! HELLO, SIR! HOW ARE YOU TODAY?
I AM DETECTIVE RIGHT-ALL-THE-TIME,
AND THIS IS MY PARTNER DETECTIVE TERRIBLE DETECTIVE.
NO SURPRISES FROM THE CORONER. A FEW GUNSHOTS, SHOULDER AND CHEST.
translation.fr: Il a été touché à l'épaule et au thorax.

translation.en: NONE OF THE NEIGHBORS HEARD OR SAW ANYTHING.
AND WHAT'S WORSE, SANTIAGO STRUCK OUT WITH A 92-YEAR-OLD.
translation.fr: Et Santiago s'est pris un râteau avec un vieux.

translation.en: THAT IS NOT ACCURATE, SIR.
WAIT, YOU HOOKED UP WITH HIM? UGH!
ALL RIGHT, HIT THE PAWN SHOPS AND CANVASS THE NEIGHBORHOOD.
AND WHILE YOU'RE OUT, YOU CAN BUY YOURSELF A TIE. (Jake) OH, ACTUALLY, SIR...
translation.fr: - Et achetez une cravate. - En fait...

translation.en: I'M WEARING A TIE RIGHT NOW. CHECK IT OUT.
SECRET TIE.
FIRST OF ALL, I THINK YOU'RE KIND OF OVERDOING IT
WITH THE MANSCAPING.
BUT MORE IMPORTANTLY, DETECTIVE, WHY DO YOU REFUSE TO TAKE MY ORDERS SERIOUSLY?
translation.fr: pourquoi refuser de me prendre au sérieux ?

translation.en: DOES ANYONE HERE KNOW WHY IT'S SO IMPORTANT TO ME THAT YOU ALL DRESS APPROPRIATELY?
translation.fr: Qui sait pourquoi je tiens à une tenue correcte ?

translation.en: HMM. FOUR HIGHLY TRAINED DETECTIVES
AND NOT ONE OF YOU CAN SOLVE THIS SIMPLE MYSTERY.
translation.fr: pas un seul n'a la clé de cette énigme.

translation.en: I WANNA BE BRIEFED ON ANY NEW DEVELOPMENTS.
translation.fr: Prévenez-moi s'il y a du nouveau. Des questions ?

translation.en: I WAS GONNA ASK YOU IF YOU THOUGHT I WAS DOING TOO MUCH MANSCAPING, BUT WE SOLVED THAT ONE.
translation.fr: J'allais demander si vous approuviez mon épilation, c'est réglé.

translation.en: YEP. WHAT ABOUT THIS FANCY HAM STUFF? JAMON IBERICO. YES.
translation.fr: - Pour ce jambon chicos... - Jamón ibérico.

translation.en: THE PERP LEFT A REALLY EXPENSIVE TV BUT THEN STOLE HAM? IT DOESN'T MAKE SENSE.
translation.fr: Laisser une télé hors de prix et voler un jambon n'est pas logique.

translation.en: IS THERE A PLACE NEARBY THE CRIME SCENE
translation.fr: On en vend près du lieu du crime ?

translation.en: BENEFICIO'S MIGHT. LET'S GO.
YOU GOTTA BRIEF THE C.O. FIRST. WE'LL BRIEF HIM AFTER WE CATCH THE GUY.
translation.fr: - Faut prévenir le chef. - Quand on aura le coupable.

translation.en: MY NAME IS RATKO. I DON'T KNOW ANYTHING.
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Ratko. Je suis pas au courant.

translation.en: OH, OKAY.
YOU RECOGNIZE THIS GUY?
HENRY MORGENTHAU? NO.
MAYBE ACTUALLY LOOK AT THE PICTURE.
I DON'T KNOW HIM. I DON'T KNOW WHAT HAPPENED. NO MORE QUESTIONS.
translation.fr: Je le connais pas. Je sais rien. Arrêtez vos questions.

translation.en: WELL, WHY DON'T I RUN A SCENARIO PAST YOU, RATKO, AND YOU TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK?
translation.fr: Je vais émettre une hypothèse, donnez-moi votre avis.

translation.en: YOU DO KNOW MORGENTHAU.
HE CAME IN HERE AND TRIED TO SELL YOU SOME HAMS. YOU KNEW THEY WERE WORTH A LOTTA MONEY,
translation.fr: il vous a proposé des jambons de luxe.

translation.en: SO YOU TRIED TO STEAL THEM FROM HIM WHEN HE WASN'T HOME. ONLY HE WAS HOME, SO YOU SHOT HIM.
translation.fr: Vous avez essayé de le dévaliser et vous l'avez tué.

translation.en: DOES THAT SOUND FAMILIAR?
UH, MAYBE SOME ROLE PLAY WILL JOG YOUR MEMORY? GREAT IDEA. OKAY, YEAH.
translation.fr: - Un jeu de rôles vous aiderait ? - Excellente idée.

translation.en: OKAY.
NO, NO, I'M RATKO. COME ON. I'M ALWAYS THE VICTIM.
translation.fr: - Non, c'est moi. - Je joue toujours la victime.

translation.en: LOOK, I'M DOING THIS WITH YOU RIGHT HERE.
FINE, FINE. [clears throat]
OH! I'M HENRY MORGENTHAU, OWNER OF DELICIOUS AND EXPENSIVE HAMS.
translation.fr: Je suis Henry Morgenthau, vendeur de délicieux jambons de luxe.

translation.en: DON'T I KNOW YOU FROM THE GROCERY STORE?
translation.fr: - Je vous ai vu à l'épicerie ? - Pan !

translation.en: KILL! AND SCENE.
translation.fr: - Je vous ai vu à l'épicerie ? - Pan ! Rideau.

translation.en: (Jake) NYPD! EVERYONE DOWN!
translation.fr: Police de New York, tout le monde à terre !

translation.en: MA'AM, IF YOU COULD JUST GET DOWN, OR...IGNORE ME AND CONTINUE SHOPPING.
translation.fr: Madame, à terre. Ou continuez vos courses.

translation.en: BOYLE, GET THE DOOR! ON IT!
WHOA, WHOA, WHOA, WHOA, RATKO!
THAT'S A WASTE OF MANCHEGO!
CHARLES!
HOW ARE YOU STILL HERE? JAKE!
LITTLE HELP!
RATKO! HE'S NOT GOING ANYWHERE, JAKE!
I GOT HIM! I GOT HIM! DON'T WORRY!
translation.fr: Je le tiens ! Plus un geste !

translation.en: (Jake) SO NO, I DID NOT BRIEF YOU.
translation.fr: Donc non, je vous ai pas prévenu.

translation.en: AND YES, HE DID GET AWAY.
BUT SOME BONUS GOOD NEWS...
translation.fr: Mais on a une super nouvelle en bonus :

translation.en: I GOT YOU HAZELNUT.
A LITTLE SPOON THERE FOR YOU.
translation.fr: Avec une petite cuillère pour vous tout seul.

translation.en: [scoffs] IS HE SERIOUSLY ASSIGNING ME
I MEAN, WHY DO WE EVEN HAVE A RECORDS ROOM?
COMPUTER'S BEEN INVENTED, RIGHT? I DIDN'T DREAM IT?
translation.fr: On a des ordis, j'ai pas rêvé ?

translation.en: YOU'RE LUCKY, MAN. I WISH I COULD GET ASSIGNED HERE FULL-TIME.
translation.fr: T'as du bol. J'aimerais être assigné ici à plein temps.

translation.en: YOU COULD NOT BE FARTHER FROM THE ACTION.
translation.fr: Y a pas plus planqué, comme boulot.

translation.en: SERGEANT, YOU KNOW ME. I HAVE MORE ARRESTS THAN ANYONE.
translation.fr: Tu sais que j'assure un max.

translation.en: WILL YOU PLEASE TELL THE CAPTAIN HOW DUMB IT IS TO LOCK HIS BEST DETECTIVE IN A FILE CABINET?
translation.fr: Dis au patron de pas placardiser son meilleur flic.

translation.en: SECOND BEST. YOU'RE WRONG ABOUT HOLT.
THAT MAN HAS FORGOTTEN MORE ABOUT BEING A COP THAN YOU WILL EVER KNOW.
translation.fr: Il en a oublié plus sur ce métier que tu n'en sauras jamais.

translation.en: IN 1981, HE CAUGHT THE DISCO STRANGLER.
translation.fr: En 1981, il a coffré l'Etrangleur disco.

translation.en: IT'S OVER, DISCO MAN! PUT DOWN THE YO-YO AND BACK AWAY FROM THE GIRL.
translation.fr: C'est fini, Discoman. Pose le yoyo et lâche la fille.

translation.en: THE MAN IS THE REAL DEAL. YOU NEED TO LISTEN TO HIM.
translation.fr: C'est un vrai de vrai. Tu ferais mieux de l'écouter.

translation.en: GONNA BE HARD TO WIN OUR BET WHEN YOU'RE ON THE BENCH, PERALTA.
translation.fr: Ça va être dur de gagner le pari sur la touche.

translation.en: ALTHOUGH I DID START A NEW CATEGORY. "MURDERERS WE LET GO."
translation.fr: Mais on a une nouvelle catégorie. "Meurtriers qu'on laisse filer".

translation.en: AND LOOK AT THAT.
YOU'RE WINNING.
HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FILES.
YEAH, YOU KNOW WHAT, I WILL HAVE FUN WITH MY FILES. HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FACE!
translation.fr: Je vais m'éclater. Toi, éclate-toi avec ta gueule !

translation.en: SLAM! THAT WAS A SLAM.
SO WHAT MOVIE DID YOU GET US TICKETS TO?
OH, WELL, JUST TO BE SAFE, I BOUGHT TICKETS TO ALL OF THEM.
translation.fr: Par précaution, j'ai des places pour tous les films.

translation.en: JUST TO BE SAFE? WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?
I DON'T KNOW, I DIDN'T WANNA MESS UP.
translation.fr: Je sais pas. Je voulais pas me planter,

translation.en: BECAUSE YOU'RE SORT OF... OPINIONATED.
translation.fr: vu que tu as des opinions tranchées.

translation.en: YOU THINK I'M OPINIONATED? OKAY, HERE'S AN OPINION FOR YOU.
translation.fr: Tu trouves ? T'es pas psychologue et ta chemise est couleur vomi.

translation.en: YOU'RE A BAD JUDGE OF CHARACTER AND YOUR SHIRT LOOKS LIKE VOMIT.
translation.fr: T'es pas psychologue et ta chemise est couleur vomi.

translation.en: SO WE CAN GO SEE NORTH BY NORTHWEST.
WE'RE NOT SEEING A MOVIE TOGETHER.
GOOD CALL. SMART.
KEEP IT PROFESH.
HEY, CAPTAIN. SO YOU FOUND SOMETHING?
HEY, I LIKE THE TIE.
IF YOU CAN'T BEAT 'EM, JOIN 'EM. ANYWAY, I THINK I GOT SOMETHING GOOD HERE.
translation.fr: La raison l'emporte. Bref, j'ai une piste.

translation.en: TURNS OUT THE NAME "RATKO" IS MADE UP.
BUT I WAS DIGGING THROUGH THESE FILES-- ONE OF WHICH I LITERALLY FOUND IN A SPIDER WEB--
translation.fr: Mais j'ai trouvé un dossier pris dans une toile d'araignée.

translation.en: AND IT TURNS OUT THERE WERE A BUNCH OF REFERENCES TO A SERBIAN THUG, STREET NAMES "THE RAT" AND "THE BUTCHER,"
translation.fr: On y parle d'un mafieux serbe surnommé "le rat" et "le boucher".

translation.en: WHO'S KNOWN TO HANG OUT AT A STORAGE UNIT
translation.fr: On le trouvait à un entrepôt près de Boerum Park, où la terre est rouge.

translation.en: NEAR BOERUM PARK, WHICH HAS RED SOIL,
translation.fr: à un entrepôt près de Boerum Park, où la terre est rouge.

translation.en: HENCE, THE MUDDY RED FOOTPRINT ON MORGENTHAU'S COUNTER.
translation.fr: D'où l'empreinte rouge sur le plan de travail de Morgenthau.

translation.en: THAT'S FINE WORK, DETECTIVE.
THANK YOU VERY MUCH, SIR. TESTAMENT TO WHAT CAN BE ACHIEVED WHEN YOU DRESS APPROPRIATELY.
translation.fr: Ça prouve ce qu'on peut accomplir dans une tenue correcte.

translation.en: LET'S POUND IT OUT.
YOU KNOW WHAT, SUCH FINE POLICE WORK,
translation.fr: Vous savez quoi ? Du si bon boulot, il faut le montrer à l'équipe.

translation.en: LET'S SHARE IT WITH THE WHOLE TEAM.
translation.fr: Du si bon boulot, il faut le montrer à l'équipe.

translation.en: SANTIAGO! BOYLE! DIAZ! GET IN HERE!
BRING EVERYONE! AND A CAMERA!
THAT'S NOT NECESSARY. OH, THEY'RE HERE!
LET'S HAVE A HAND FOR THE WORK
translation.fr: - Bravo. - Les voilà ! On applaudit notre jeune superflic, Jake Peralta.

translation.en: OF THE FINE MASTER DETECTIVE, JAKE PERALTA.
translation.fr: On applaudit notre jeune superflic, Jake Peralta.

translation.en: GIVE HIM A HAND.
(Amy) NO RECORD OF RATKO ON THE LEDGER.
MUST'VE USED CASH.
translation.fr: Pas de Ratko sur le registre. Il a dû payer cash.

translation.en: WELL, I, FOR ONE, AM JUST PUMPED TO BE ON A STAKEOUT WITH YOU, CAPTAIN.
translation.fr: Moi, je suis trop content de planquer avec vous, capitaine.

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT MY FAVORITE THING ABOUT STAKEOUTS IS?
PATROL GUIDE SAYS "NO DRESS CODE."
SO I'M JUST THE ZIP-UP HOODIE AND MY TWO BEST FRIENDS.
translation.fr: Juste un sweat zippé. Et mes deux meilleurs amis.

translation.en: DOES HE ALWAYS TALK THIS MUCH?
I JUST TUNE IT OUT. IT'S LIKE A WHITE NOISE MACHINE.
translation.fr: Je fais abstraction. C'est du bruit blanc.

translation.en: OKAY, FIRST OF ALL, THAT'S RACIST.
SECONDLY, CAPTAIN,
translation.fr: Deuzio, Terry dit que vous avez eu l'Etrangleur disco ?

translation.en: TERRY TOLD ME YOU CAUGHT THE DISCO STRANGLER.
translation.fr: Terry dit que vous avez eu l'Etrangleur disco ?

translation.en: THAT'S INCREDIBLE. I'VE READ THAT CASE.
translation.fr: C'est dingue. J'ai lu le dossier.

translation.en: WITH ALL DUE RESPECT, SIR, WHY'D IT TAKE YOU SO LONG TO GET YOUR FIRST COMMAND?
translation.fr: Pourquoi vous avez pas dirigé de district plus tôt ?

translation.en: BECAUSE I'M GAY.
SERIOUSLY?
I'M SURPRISED YOU DIDN'T KNOW. I DON'T TRY TO HIDE IT.
translation.fr: Je vous croyais au courant. Je ne le cache pas.

translation.en: DID ANYONE ELSE GET A LITTLE BIT OF A GAY VIBE?
translation.fr: Vous avez pas senti un petit côté gay ?

translation.en: [slowed down] MANSCAPING.
DAMN!
I AM NOT A GOOD DETECTIVE.
translation.fr: Je suis pas un bon enquêteur.

translation.en: (Rosa) HERE. I FEEL BAD THAT YOU SPENT ALL THAT MONEY ON THE MOVIE TICKETS.
translation.fr: Tiens. Je m'en veux pour les places.

translation.en: WHY DON'T YOU JUST GO TO THE MOVIES WITH ME? NOPE.
translation.fr: T'as qu'à venir au ciné avec moi.

translation.en: WELL, THIS IS AWKWARD.
IT'S NOT AWKWARD.
I LIKE YOUR COMPANY.
YOU'RE SWEET.
WHEN DID YOU COME OUT? ABOUT 25 YEARS AGO.
translation.fr: - Vous l'avez révélé quand ? - Il y a 25 ans.

translation.en: THE NYPD WAS NOT READY FOR AN OPENLY GAY DETECTIVE.
translation.fr: La police n'était pas prête à m'accueillir à bras ouverts.

translation.en: BUT THEN THE OLD GUARD DIED OUT.
translation.fr: Puis la vieille garde est morte.

translation.en: SUDDENLY, THEY COULDN'T WAIT TO SHOW OFF THE FACT THAT THEY HAD A HIGHLY RANKING GAY OFFICER.
translation.fr: Soudain, ils étaient ravis d'exhiber un gay haut gradé.

translation.en: I MADE CAPTAIN. BUT THEY PUT ME IN A PUBLIC AFFAIRS UNIT.
translation.fr: On m'a promu capitaine, mais aux relations publiques.

translation.en: I WAS A GOOD SOLDIER. I HELPED RECRUITMENT.
translation.fr: J'ai été un bon soldat, j'ai aidé à recruter.

translation.en: BUT ALL I EVER REALLY WANTED WAS MY OWN COMMAND.
AND NOW I FINALLY GOT IT.
AND I'M NOT GONNA SCREW IT UP.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas tout gâcher.

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I'M SORRY. I--
I FEEL LIKE A JACKASS.
BUT ON THE FLIP SIDE, THERE'S RATKO.
HUMILITY OVER. I'M AMAZING!
FANTASTIC. 3,000 IDENTICAL BLUE DOORS.
LOOKS LIKE WE ALL GOT DOOR DUTY.
translation.fr: On va tous devoir frapper aux portes.

translation.en: AH, YEAH. FROM BEFORE.
translation.fr: On va tous devoir frapper aux portes. A cause de ce matin. Bien vu.

translation.en: GOOD ONE. YOU LOOK GREAT.
translation.fr: A cause de ce matin. Bien vu. Tu es belle.

translation.en: CLEAR.
CLEAR.
UN-BELIEVABLE!
RATKO, GREAT TO SEE YOU.
YOU CAN'T STOP ME.
I'M GOING.
ACTUALLY, YOU'RE NOT GOING ANYWHERE.
translation.fr: En fait... vous irez nulle part.

translation.en: 'CAUSE IF YOU TAKE A LOOK TO YOUR LEFT,
translation.fr: A votre gauche, vous verrez les inspecteurs Boyle

translation.en: YOU'LL SEE DETECTIVE'S BOYLE AND DIAZ.
translation.fr: A votre gauche, vous verrez les inspecteurs Boyle et Diaz.

translation.en: RIGHT THERE IS DETECTIVE SANTIAGO.
AND BEHIND YOU IS CAPTAIN HOLT.
translation.fr: Et derrière vous, le capitaine Holt. Bref,

translation.en: POINT IS... MY TEAM HAS YOU SURROUNDED.
OH, MY GOD, I JUST GOT THE TIE THING!
translation.fr: Je viens de piger pour la cravate !

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I JUST FIGURED IT OUT.
MAYBE NOW'S NOT THE BEST TIME, DETECTIVE.
IT'S A UNIFORM!
translation.fr: C'est l'uniforme ! On forme une équipe,

translation.en: WE'RE A TEAM, AND THE TIE IS A PART
translation.fr: C'est l'uniforme ! On forme une équipe, et la cravate fait l'uniforme. C'est ça ?

translation.en: OF THAT TEAM'S UNIFORM, RIGHT?
translation.fr: et la cravate fait l'uniforme. C'est ça ?

translation.en: YOU ASK RATKO WHAT TEAM?
NO, RATKO, SHUT UP.
IT'S IMPORTANT TO YOU BECAUSE YOU WERE KEPT OFF THE TEAM FOR SO LONG.
translation.fr: Vous avez longtemps été mis à l'écart.

translation.en: AND NOW YOU'RE THE COACH,
AND YOU WANT US TO ALL WEAR THAT SAME UNIFORM.
translation.fr: et vous voulez qu'on porte l'uniforme, boum !

translation.en: BOOM! NAILED IT!
YES, YOU DID. NOW JUST ARREST RATKO.
ALL RIGHT, RATKO, DOWN. DROP THE WEAPON.
translation.fr: A genoux, lâchez votre arme. Mains sur la tête.

translation.en: HANDS ON YOUR HEAD. HERE WE GO.
translation.fr: A genoux, lâchez votre arme. Mains sur la tête. C'est bien.

translation.en: HEY! HE'S RUNNING!
OH! GOT HIM! HANDS BEHIND YOUR BACK! HANDS BEHIND YOUR BACK!
translation.fr: On s'en charge. Les mains dans le dos !

translation.en: (Boyle) STAY DOWN.
THAT'S HOW WE DO IT IN THE NINE-NINE, SIR.
translation.fr: Voilà comment ça se passe au 99e district.

translation.en: CATCH BAD GUYS AND LOOK GOOD DOING IT.
translation.fr: On arrête les méchants avec classe.

translation.en: WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOU?
NEVER TOOK OFF THE SPEEDO. BIG MISTAKE.
translation.fr: J'ai pas enlevé le maillot. Grave erreur. Il est en moi.

translation.en: IT IS INSIDE ME. GREAT WORK, TEAM!
translation.fr: J'ai pas enlevé le maillot. Grave erreur. Il est en moi. Beau boulot !
